title: Çigköftem
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Fast food, Take-out, Turkish
description: Turkish vegetarian fast food franchise offering primarily a vegan vegetable pate made of grains, walnut, tomato puree, sunflower oil, parsley, and green onion, which are formed into little balls or fingers and place inside wraps or on mixed plates. Main product is vegan kofte. The food is 100% vegan, although there is one non-vegan yogurt drink available in the refrigerator. You can also get lettuce wraps. Choose spicy or non-spicy. A few tables for dining in are available.
